item.title: Abandonned black bin, 28th December
item.description:
This bin has been abondonned and left in the described location. People are using it as a public bin until it over flows then start dumping garbage around it. No one is claiming it and it is becoming a nuisance.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Ashenden Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter jammed in to wall crevice on westbere house around back, 28th December
item.description:
Litter in wall crevice around back of westbere house ,, children trying to set light to it ,surrounding westbere house as usual ,always litter ,never cleaned ,clarion caretaker says not his problem ,down to Bromley council allegedly ,litter pick or sweeping never done by bins etc

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sholden Gardens, Poverest, Greater London

item.title: Flytipping and dumped vehicles, 28th December
item.description:
White van dumped on 5th November. Grey van dumped about a week after. White goods and general work waste is being dumped in the back of the white van on a weekly basis. I have taken photos and videos of this being done. This has been reported to Hyde housing but they are not doing anything about it. This is a private parking area by Nazareth Gardens SE15

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Nazareth Gardens, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
